author: jnioche
msg: NUTCH-1799 ANT Eclipse task discovers all plugin jars automatically (jnioche)

author: jacopoc
msg: Applied fix from trunk for revision: 1609149
Removed from "parseEntityXmlFile" the useless require-new-transaction="true" because in this service definition we have use-transaction="false"

author: jacopoc
msg: Applied fix from trunk for revision: 1609155

This is a slightly modified version of the work contributed by Simone Viani in OFBIZ-5619: when a service model was cloned (e.g. when runSync/call-service are invoked passing the require-new-transaction flag) the service was executed with use-transaction set to true, even if the called service is defined to not use it. Also added some checks to make sure that if require-new-transaction is true then also use-transaction must be true.
